short.am,ar,bn,ca,cs,da,el,es,es_419,et,fa,fi,: FaceChange is a free ai face swap plugin that allows photo swap, video swap and multiple face swap for free!
short.bg,de,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,id,ja: FaceChange is a free AI face swap plugin that allows photo swaps, video swaps, and multiple face swaps for free!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FaceChange is a completely free AI face swapper that allows users to switch faces in photos or videos without any cost. It offers unlimited swaps with no login required. Enjoy unlimited face swaps with no limitations!

Key Features
1 Photo Face Swap
Our advanced AI algorithm makes face swapping quick and easy. Just upload a photo, wait a few seconds, and get a realistic swapped image.

2 Video Face Swap
Have fun swapping faces in videos. Our AI changes faces in every frame, recognizing and replacing all faces with the one you want.

3 Multiple Face Swap
Swap faces in group photos from family parties or weddings. Share the joy of face swapping with friends and family.

4 100% Free Swaps
Enjoy unlimited swaps without needing to buy credits. This face swapper plugin is truly free, not just a trial.

5 No Login Required
No login is needed to use our service, providing a smooth and unlimited swapping experience.

6 Unlimited Swaps for Free
Switch faces on any picture without any limitations. You won't be interrupted by payment prompts.

7 Privacy
Your privacy is our priority. We guarantee that we will not store or share your personal data with anyone.

8 No watermark
All your swapped photos and videos will be free of watermarks, ensuring a clean and professional look.

Tips for realistic face swapping
There are some tips to make reface more natural and realistic: 
1 Use High-Quality Photos and Videos
Start with high-resolution images or videos. The better the quality, the more realistic the swapping results will be.
2 Match Lighting and Angles

Ensure the lighting and angles of both faces are similar. Matching these aspects will help the new face blend seamlessly into the original photo or video.

3 Choose Similar Face Shapes
Select faces with similar shapes and proportions. This ensures that the swapped face fits naturally onto the original.

4 Align Facial Features
Pay attention to the alignment of eyes, nose, and mouth. Proper alignment is crucial for a realistic look.
